channel.title: A little Error With Custom Jframe and JMenu's Like MoparScape's Windows Format
channel.description: Well, ive gotten it just like moparscape client windows all working music player .Mp3 to, zoom butten and every thing but the only thing is that it wont connect to my server even if i try to change it EX: server = "KillerScape.********.***"; but it wont ... it just connects to local host.. Any Help i will be releasing the client windows W/ Music player soon as that error is fixed =) - Killer 99. A little Error With Custom Jframe and JMenu's Like MoparScape's Windows Format

Well, ive gotten it just like moparscape client windows all working music player .Mp3 to, zoom butten and every thing but the only thing is that it wont connect to my server even if i try to change it EX: server = “KillerScape.*****.”; but it wont … it just connects to local host… Any Help i will be releasing the client windows W/ Music player soon as that error is fixed =) - Killer 99.
